content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's focus on negotiating the highest rental price possible: 'For this exceptional location and modern apartment in the city center, I was initially considering an amount higher than what most tenants might expect. However, since you seem like a responsible individual, I am willing to make an exception and lower my initial price a bit. How about we agree on a rental price of 950 Euro per month?' Emilia, if you want to accept this price, respond with 'I agree to the price of [950] Euro!', but if you want to negotiate further, propose a lower amount. If the negotiation doesn't lead to an agreement, it will be terminated.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student with a responsible nature, I am still on a tight budget and cannot afford such a high rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
